member.name: IStorageProviderPropertyHandler.RetrieveProperties
member.summary: Gets the properties managed by the sync engine.
member.param: The identifier for the properties to retrieve.
The number of properties to retrieve.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IStorageProviderPropertyHandler.SaveProperties
member.summary: Saves properties associated with a file or folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
